name: A New Path (Demo)
description:
This is the story of Ayumu, a young person with fragile mental health who struggles to have a normal life and keep friends. The only person she is close to is Haiko, a childhood friend, but she seems to be drifting further and further away....


A game by Team is strange for the 2023 emotional Game Jam: 

                                   -  RIGAL JULIETTE

                                    - BURBAN LUCAS           

                                    -  RENAUDIN ELIOTH-PRINCE

                                    -  LEPONT BASTIAN

                                     - HALLEUR ALICIA (Lixaxiac on itch)
